entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
